AmortizationOfFinancingCostsAndDiscounts.label: Amortization of Debt Issuance Costs and Discounts
AmortizationOfFinancingCostsAndDiscounts.description: Amount of amortization expense attributable to debt discount (premium) and debt issuance costs.

ConversionOfStockSharesConverted1.label: Conversion of Stock, Shares Converted
ConversionOfStockSharesConverted1.description: "The number of shares converted in a noncash (or part noncash) transaction. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

DebtInstrumentUnamortizedDiscountCurrent.label: Debt Instrument, Unamortized Discount, Current
DebtInstrumentUnamortizedDiscountCurrent.description: Amount of debt discount to be amortized within one year or within the normal operating cycle, if longer.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerBas.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Per Basic and Diluted Share
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerBas.description: The amount of net income (loss) from continuing operations per each basic and diluted share of common stock or unit when the per share amount is the same for both basic and diluted shares.

IncomeTaxReconciliationDeductions.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Deduction, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationDeductions.description: Amount of difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to deduction. Includes, but is not limited to, dividend deduction, deduction for dividend paid to employee stock ownership plan (ESOP), Medicare prescription drug benefit subsidy deduction, and other deductions.

IncreaseDecreaseInMarketableSecuritiesRe.label: Increase (Decrease) in Marketable Securities, Restricted
IncreaseDecreaseInMarketableSecuritiesRe.description: The change during the period, either increase or decrease, in total debt and equity financial instruments including: (1) securities held-to-maturity, (2) trading securities, and (3) securities available-for-sale that are pledged to one or more secured parties who have the right to buy, sell, or re-pledge the collateral.

IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToCon.label: Incremental Common Shares Attributable to Dilutive Effect of Conversion of Preferred Stock
IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToCon.description: Additional shares included in the calculation of diluted EPS as a result of the potentially dilutive effect of convertible preferred stock using the if-converted method.

LesseeOperatingLeaseDiscountRate.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Discount Rate
LesseeOperatingLeaseDiscountRate.description: Discount rate used by lessee to determine present value of operating lease payments.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, after Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease due after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

MarketableSecuritiesCurrent.label: Marketable Securities, Current
MarketableSecuritiesCurrent.description: Amount of investment in marketable security, classified as current.

MarketableSecuritiesUnrealizedGainLoss.label: Marketable Securities, Unrealized Gain (Loss)
MarketableSecuritiesUnrealizedGainLoss.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in marketable security.

NetInvestmentIncome.label: Net Investment Income
NetInvestmentIncome.description: Amount, after investment expense, of income earned from investments in securities and real estate. Includes, but is not limited to, real estate investment, policy loans, dividends, and interest. Excludes realized gain (loss) on investments.

NotesPayableRelatedPartiesNoncurrent.label: Notes Payable, Related Parties, Noncurrent
NotesPayableRelatedPartiesNoncurrent.description: The amount for notes payable (written promise to pay), payable to related parties, which are due after one year (or one business cycle).

PaymentsToAcquireMarketableSecurities.label: Payments to Acquire Marketable Securities
PaymentsToAcquireMarketableSecurities.description: Amount of cash outflow for purchase of marketable security.

WarrantsAndRightsOutstanding.label: Warrants and Rights Outstanding
WarrantsAndRightsOutstanding.description: Value of outstanding derivative securities that permit the holder the right to purchase securities (usually equity) from the issuer at a specified price.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfEquity.label: Payments for Repurchase of Equity
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfEquity.description: The cash outflow to reacquire common and preferred stock.

ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfMarketableS.label: Proceeds from Sale and Maturity of Marketable Securities
ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfMarketableS.description: The cash inflow associated with the aggregate amount received by the entity through sale or maturity of marketable securities (held-to-maturity or available-for-sale) during the period.

TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.label: Treasury Stock, Value, Acquired, Cost Method
TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.description: Equity impact of the cost of common and preferred stock that were repurchased during the period. Recorded using the cost method.

UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Investments
UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityUndiscounte.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, Undiscounted Excess Amount
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityUndiscounte.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments in excess of discounted obligation for lease payments for operating lease.

OperatingLeaseLiability.label: Operating Lease, Liability
OperatingLeaseLiability.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease.

OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent.label: Operating Lease, Liability, Current
OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease, classified as current.

OperatingLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent.label: Operating Lease, Liability, Noncurrent
OperatingLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease, classified as noncurrent.

OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRat.label: Operating Lease, Weighted Average Discount Rate, Percent
OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRat.description: Weighted average discount rate for operating lease calculated at point in time.
